Name: Story Mission
Contents: Commandant, please allow me to remind you that each operation is accompanied by a variety of missions.
After completing the mission, you will receive a large number of supplies. Please make sure that you collect them in time.
This will help us acquire advanced equipment earlier, which will be useful in future operations.
Let us do so next.

Name: Get Constructs, level up
Contents: Commandant, thanks to everyone's hard work, I can finally rejoin the fight!
Before that, please upgrade and tune me, then assign the battle position for me.
Commandant... I can't wait to fight alongside with everyone together.

Name: Improve skill
Contents: Commandant, we Constructs will become more proficient at using our skills as we fight in more battles.
Please upgrade my skill level so that I can bring out its true potential.
If possible... please pay attention to my performance in the next battle.

Name: Novice Mission
Contents: Greetings, Commandant of the Gray Raven squad. There was something that I forgot to tell you.
Novice missions have been set for all first-timer squads in this operation. Squads can earn extra supplies by completing these goals.
I'm sure you'll have no problem clearing them. I have high hopes for you.
Good luck!

Name: Promote Construct
Contents: Commandant. The Constructs have their own military ranks.
It not only symbolizes honor, but raising their ranks will also increase their performance.
Complete specific missions to promote a Construct.
I look forward to bringing honor to the team, Commandant.

Name: Sign-in
Contents: Commandant, battles can be long and difficult. In return for your daily efforts...
Signing in will earn you supplies every day! They will help you in your journey.
The supply center has prepared a special weapon for you as your first sign-in reward.
Gray Raven will always be with you, Commandant!

Name: Mission - Daily
Contents: Commandant, you should have your own mission board, right?
In addition to your main missions, there are daily missions that can be completed for that day.
Don't underestimate these mission rewards!
Now, let's take a look at the mission board.

Name: Research System
Contents: Hello, Commandant of the Gray Raven squad!
Who am I? Don't you worry about that. We'll meet soon.
Now, I know what you're thinking...
You want more Constructs to join your squad, right?
Try out this R&D Ticket. Consider it a gift!

Name: Main Quest Guide
Contents: As battles get more difficult, we need to ensure a steady flow of supplies.
Keep it up and complete your major missions.
This will ensure that we have enough resources as our enemies get tougher.
Let's strive for humanity together, Commandant.

Name: Daily - Character EXP
Contents: Outside of main missions, you can also have your Constructs take part in training programs.
Training allows us to gain experience in simulation battles.
Please remember to schedule training sessions for us in the future.

Name: Normal Shop
Contents: A new support squad has arrived in the region, Commandant. They are eager to meet with you.
In addition to delivering supplies, they will also trade resources with you.
Let's try trading something with them.

Name: Tutorial Stage
Contents: Hello, Commandant! How are you getting along with the Constructs of Gray Raven?
What's that? Still feel like you don't know much about them?
Don't worry, I have a tutorial for you to help you understand them.
And here are some Black Cards to reward you for mastering it all.
So, please familiarize yourself with the abilities of the Constructs!

Name: Skill Stage
Contents: Commandant, are you running into skill point shortage issues when trying to upgrade Construct skills?
Battle Exercises are a great way to get more skill points.
Try it out if you need them.

Name: Coin Stage
Contents: These cogs contain an important material used in our Construct frames.
A lot of cogs are required to extract enough materials to upgrade our frames.
Cogs can be found in many places, especially in Cogs Galore.

Name: Equipment EXP Stage
Contents: Commandant, our equipment are made from special materials.
Upgrading them requires the same special materials.
We can find these upgrade materials from Logistics Maintenance.

Name: Equipment Overclock Stage
Contents: Commandant, equipment eventually reaches a point where they can no longer be upgraded.
Overclock materials are required to enhance them further.
This will allow you to enhance equipment to a higher level.
You can get Overclock materials from Military Hardware.

Name: Challenge - Trial Mission
Contents: Looks like you're ready to move past basic battle operations.
I've seen many outstanding Commandants rise through the ranks, and I see the makings of one in you.
Try these challenges to prove your worth.
Why am I helping you? It's only to collect more data.

Name: Story Mission - Hard
Contents: Commandant, do you remember the battles that you participated in?
You usually only get to see one side of the story.
Over time, however, records from other sources become available.
Essentially, you have the chance to observe what happened from another perspective.
So, let's trying replaying the past, shall we?

Name: Auto Clear
Contents: Once we're familiar with the tactics of a particular operation...
The risk of battling becomes greatly reduced. This enables the Auto Clear feature.
This allows us to complete familiar missions without the need of your command.
This way, you'll be able to focus your attention on more important missions.

Name: High-rank Equipment Stage
Contents: High-rank Memories are important to improving the combative capabilities of a Construct.
The more difficult the Combat Supply mission, the higher the chance to get high-rank Memories.
Now, let's try more difficult missions to test the limits of the squad!

Name: Construct - Details
Contents: Greetings, Commandant of the Gray Raven squad!
Curious about me?
We all have our own personal files.
You may learn a thing or two about us Constructs when you look through them!

Name: Trial Zone
Contents: We meet again, Commandant of Gray Raven.
Have you noticed that you now have access to the Trial Zone?
The Trial Zone offers the opportunity to try out various prototype projects under development...
... or, depending on the perspective, practical tricks by the research team.

Name: Construct Army
Contents: More and more Constructs have joined our team.
You can view your Construct roster and status on the Construct Army page.
Reach Construct development milestones to get special materials.
I'm sure you'll find them useful...

Name: Co-op
Contents: Here's a message for you, rookie.
There have been sightings of very powerful Corrupted.
You should not attempt to combat these powerful foes on your own.
Join a Co-op operation to prove your ability to work with others.
I have high expectations for you, Gray Raven.

Name: Support
Contents: Most operations often involve multiple squads.
You can request assistance from other squads before a battle.
Try issuing a call for Constructs from other squads.

Name: Side Story
Contents: Commandant, remember Mr. Hassen's tip?
The more you know, the more decisions you face.
As your relationship with Constructs improves, you will be able to access more of their personal files.
Let me give you some advice. As you learn more about their past...
Make sure you treasure your present and future with them.

Name: Construct - Outfit
Contents: Commandant, we have received a new coating from HQ.
Coatings are purely cosmetic and do not affect Construct performance.
Um... Commandant, would you like me to put on a new coating?

Name: Bounty Mission
Contents: Let's do some bounty missions, Commandant!
Oh, right. I need to explain them to you.
Completing bounty missions will earn your team a lot of experience.
But more importantly, bounty hunting sounds real cool!

Name: Infrastructure and Dormitory
Contents: Commandant, the Dormitory is finally open!
This symbolizes that we are ready to take root on Earth for the long haul.
I'm looking forward to living in the dorms with everybody!
You can also modify and upgrade the Dormitory.
I'm sure you'll make it a great place!

Name: Challenge - War Zone
Contents: Which would you prefer, competition or cooperation?
Whether for honor or for resources, everything in the War Zone is earned through competition.
Earn a high enough rank to access a new War Zone...
...Which will grant even better rewards.
This is the ultimate trial ground for Gray Raven. How far can you go?

Name: Challenge - Phantom Pain Cage
Contents: Good. I was worried that you won't pick up the receiver.
I've been analyzing Gray Raven's battle logs.
It looks like those special Corrupted have been giving you a hard time.
I'm giving you permission to use the training facilities to simulate training against these special Corrupted.
Get used to fighting them quickly, because enemies will only get tougher.

Name: Exploration
Contents: Are you as curious about this world as I am, Commandant of Gray Raven?
I long to return to Earth as much as you do, even though I was not born there.
There are so many secrets waiting to be discovered in the wastelands...
If you're interested, I can tell you about some... special places that we've found.

Name: Medal System
Contents: Greetings, Commandant. You now have access to the Medal system.
Medals are issued to those who have contributed to the cause of the United Human Front. You can find yours in the Central Database.

Name: Challenge - Border Pact
Contents: Thanks to your hard work, Babylonia is able to establish a foothold on the ground.
This is a new start for us, so here comes your next mission.
You're about to head to the "Reconstruction Zone" located near the safe zones.
Eliminate all the remaining enemies and restart the Central Purification Filters, so our Engineering Force can start their work.
I'll cover more detail after the Central Purification Filters are completed.

Name: Medal 1
Contents: I want to talk to you about Gray Raven's recent performance.
Your recent performance has been exemplary, and you have earned the medal of Ace Commandant.
With achievement also comes expectation. I look forward to your next victory.
I've sent you the certification link. Go ahead and claim your medal!

Name: Medal 2
Contents: It has been a long time since I've seen so many dots on the monitor. These dots represent the strongholds of humanity.
You've completed the mission successfully. And your contributions to Babylonia are well-noted.
I hereby issue you the Medal of Pioneers in recognition of your achievements. I look forward to your future endeavors!
Go, claim this medal of glory now.

Name: Medal 3
Contents: Hmph, you are full of surprises.
It's been a long time since I last saw a Commandant reach 1 million Progress. You were only a little slower than my performance when I was young.
You should be proud of it. It's an exclusive club of two.
You are now authorized for the medal. Claim it now!

Name: Medal 4
Contents: This is the 9th liberation report from you. It seemed like an eternity ago that you and your team fought in your first battle...
You and your Constructs have grown into a true team, a bright beacon in the darkness. Your companions also indicate your strength.
Here is the Medal of Light Tower in honor of your achievements as the guiding light of humanity.
Now share the joy with your comrades!

Name: Medal 5
Contents: I've seen you overcome many challenges in your path.
The path of leadership that you walk brings back many memories.
On behalf of the United Humanity Front, I hereby issue to you the Medal of Human Leader.
From now on, your duty is not to earn the approval of others, but to bring them hope and point them towards the future. See you on the bridge.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 1
Contents: Congratulations on the capture of City 015, Commandant. The Engineering Force is already on its way to repair the city's Central Purification Filter.
Be careful, however, as there are still pockets of Corrupted on the outskirts.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 2
Contents: A small step for your team, a great step towards victory over the Punishing Virus.
Gray Raven's efforts have led to the full retreat of the Ascendant from this city, as well as the establishment of our first major stronghold on Earth. I look forward to your future performance.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 3
Contents: You have not only recaptured a stronghold for humanity, but also preserved the artifacts of the museum. Good job.
The Archaeological Team sends their regards. We'll make sure that you're rewarded!

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 4
Contents: Good job completing your mission in the harsh environment of the desert.
We've struggled to make headways in this region for a long time, now, we've finally established a foothold here thanks to you. The work of Babylonia can finally be carried out smoothly.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 5
Contents: The data that you obtained from the test area are of great... historical importance to the development of M.I.N.D. technology.
I thank you on behalf of the education center under the Science Council.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 6
Contents: I'm sure you understand that details regarding the Luna City Arsenal are classified.
That's why we're not in a position to hold a public award ceremony for you.
Still, you should know that we appreciate your work.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 7
Contents: The murals... Sagemachina... interesting.
Your capture of these ruins allows us to investigate them up close. Good job.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 9
Contents: Taking back the space station means a lot to the security of the surroundings of Babylonia in future.
On behalf of Babylonia, I would like to thank you for your outstanding contribution. I look forward to your return.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 10
Contents: Looks like it went well.
I knew you could do it.
By the way, have you considered our offer? Akdilek would be pleased to have you join us, anytime.

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 11
Contents: Many thanks for your assistance.
The problems here are mostly resolved. The ship will now sail to the right direction.
But nobody knows what awaits us at the destination...
Whatever. It was you who brought us the opportunity to change. Thanks!

Name: Clear Stronghold Chapter 12
Contents: Good to see you back.
Humans suffered quite a loss this time, but it's okay. Because I still see hope in your eyes.
Alright, we still have lots to do, but you should take a good rest now.
There's someone waiting for you, don't forget.

Name: Gift Mission Lee
Contents: Thanks for spending time with them.
We've been able to enjoy the holidays thanks to you.
Have a good rest. I've prepared a little gift for you back at HQ. Check it out later!

Name: Gift Mission Liv
Contents: I've never been part of an event like this... It feels a little strange.
But I enjoy seeing the smile on everybody's faces.
Here's a little gift. I hope you like it.

Name: Gift Mission Kamui
Contents: Hey Commandant, guess what I have for you?
It's my special New Year present!
Wait, where did it go? I thought I put it in my bag...
Did I already send it out? Let's go take a look!

Name: Gift Mission Lucia
Contents: Happy New Year, Commandant.
Thank you for all that you've done this past year.
May the next year be just as productive.

Name: Gift Mission Nanami
Contents: Commandant, Commandant! Happy New Year!
Miss me already?
Guess what, Nanami's got a New Year present for you!
Happy? Like it? This is the part where you praise Nanami!

Name: Gift Mission Celica
Contents: It was quite a surprise when you asked me to come over for Spring Festival.
But I really enjoyed it!
Here's a little something in return.
Keep it a secret between us, ok?

Name: Gift Mission Karenina
Contents: I'm definitely not saying that I enjoyed Spring Festival with you guys!
I'm just saying that if you're gonna have a party, you need fireworks!
Luckily for you, I've got them prepared.
And since it's boring to watch fireworks by myself, I'll let you watch them together with me.
